exception.name: ErrorUnlockTransactionLoggingFailed
exception.description: This exception is thrown by the SE API method unlockTransactionLogging when unlocking of the transaction logging functionality fails.

javadoc.summary: This class defines the exception ErrorUnlockTransactionLoggingFailed that is thrown by the SE API method unlockTransactionLogging when unlocking of the transaction logging functionality fails.

specification.requirement: SHALL be raised when transaction logging unlock operation fails
